short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search products on Kraftly by image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you find products on Kraftly performing a visual search on any other image on the internet. Simply right click on any image across the internet on any web page and find that product or similar products on Kraftly to shop instantly.
